subject: Enigmatic
text:
The secular love: 
you are contaminated
between skin and prayer.

Back from the odyssey
finding a crop-circle
in bridal chamber.

Rival was an alien
with a flat stomach
thinking black.

The thieving sperms 
had a glorious end, 
unentered in grass.

Your body was churning out
a religion.
I will find out my own god.
